modName: Light and heavy shiny Catsuits Bodyslide CB plus plus TBBP
summary: This is a stand alone upgrade of mxwqtkl´s super mod: Shiny rubber catsuits for bodyslide CB++.
descriptionHtml:
Many thanks to mxwqtkl for his fantastic looking catsuit´s.

You can upgrade all parts of light and heavy armor versions.
I have included an invisible mask per type for armor bonuses and enchanting too, for those, who don´t want to run across skyrim wearing a gasmask. 
Also i´ve added a green, brown, pink and purple version, so you get black, blue, red, white, redwhite and the new colors. 

It´s all craftable on tanning rack:
Transparent clothes = Studded
Normal clothes = Hide
Light armor = Leather
Heavy armor = Imperial (Heavy)

Please keep in mind:
If you install Ballet boots this mod will crash your game to desktop without HDT High Heels:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36213//?

I´ve testet all catsuits with bodyslide CB++ and TBBP works fine!
Bodyslide CB++:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32731//?

Don´t ask me about clipping and changing textures or so, my knowledge about this wouldn´t help you much!^^

Use this mod on your own risk.

Like mxwqtkl wrote:
Please modify and distribute this as you like. Don't request me to do conversions, but feel free to make your own.

And now, enjoy and endorse!

Credits:
mxwqtkl

Edit:

V 1.2
Added a Gold and Silver version, with gasmask and collar she looks like an alien!^^
You don´t need balletboots any longer, but if you install them, you still need hdt high heels!
"Gerbgestell" is gone with this version, i hope so!^^
author: wolfdk
